profileAlternative.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Skyward, A Verizon company and LinkedIn Learning Technical Author
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a veteran software engineer with over 12 years of experience designing and implementing scalable, distributed systems while working in an Scrum environment.

I specialize in containerized, cloud-native, reactive backend services deployed via a automated CI/CD pipeline.

I have a passion for mentoring, teaching and collaboration.

I give back to the technical community by creating courses on LinkedIn Learning and through Open Source contributions. I enjoy online learning through MOOCs and other online platforms and networking and attending meetups within the local tech community.

Life-long Learner.

Top 5% on Stackoverflow.

Over 150k learners have viewed my courses on LinkedIn Learning.

Specialities: Java, Spring, Cloud(AWS), Microservice Architecture, Devops
Other skills: Front-end(Typescript, Angular)

Skills I'm working on: Machine Learning, Data Science, Design, UI/UX, Blockchain

positions.title: LinkedIn Learning Content Author - Tech
positions.description:
- Design and author content for video-based e-learning focusing on technologies in the Java ecosystem for LinkedIn Learning and Lynda.com
- Write scripts, visuals, diagrams and code that appear in videos
- Travel on-site to record and refine content

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Design and development of reactive, cloud-native containerized micro-services built with Java, Spring and Vert.x deployed via a Kubernetes CI/CD pipeline.
- Development of core platform libraries such as structured logging, health checks, automatic documentation generation and more.
- Worked in a DevOps capacity with build automation systems, Helm charts for Kubernetes and Docker.
…
see more

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Full-time Employee of Softsource Consulting(Working on-site @ Nike)
- Development of REST APIs using Java and Spring
- Participation in Scrum/Agile teams
- AWS Cloud deployments and Microservice architecture

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Development of full-stack apps using Java and Spring, AngularJS, REST APIs, CSS3 and HTML5.
- Social media, blogging and technical networking/meetups.
- Participation in Scrum/Agile teams
- Cloud deployments leveraging AWS, Docker and other DevOps tools.

given.text: Chris is a passionate advocate for developer experience. He has a passion for ongoing education, improving training processes and creating sustainable documentation practices to improve developer satisfaction and productivity.

I rarely have the pleasure of working with someone as dedicated to learning and teaching other as Chris. I worked with Chris at OpenGov, where his constant drive to help others around him get better was always evident. Chris was always willing to learn and improve his abilities no matter how difficult the topic was. Chris is a valuable team member for any organization that cares about learning and wants to see their employees get better.
…
See more

received.text:
Noel is a unicorn in the technical world.  She is very talented technically, has an exceptional understanding of interpersonal interactions, has a sense for design and product and is just a bundle of joy and enthusiasm.

She is a whirlwind of gentle intelligence with a kind heart and a thirst for knowledge and excellence.

Gary is a bar-raising, highly skilled engineer that possesses an uncanny and profoundly gifted ability to untangle extremely complicated technical problems.  

He has a dedication to engineering excellence and a laser focus on solving the most important and demanding technical challenges with robust, elegant solutions.

He's also a great guy and an amazing teammate.

items: Building a Reactive App with Angular and SpringBoot 2
